properties.entry: select note_id, fracture, case when note_set = 'train' then 1 else 0 end train from fracture_demo

select f.note_id, canonical_form, COUNT(*) from anno_word_token w inner join anno_base da on w.anno_base_id = da.anno_base_id inner join document d on d.document_id = da.document_id inner join fracture_demo f on f.note_id = d.uid where canonical_form is not null and d.analysis_batch = 'cpe-fracture' group by f.note_id, canonical_form
